subject: Robberies and Thefts
Decisions and Verdicts
Football
Prisons and Prisoners
Firearms
lead_paragraph: Maurice Clarett pleaded guilty Monday to aggravated robbery and carrying a concealed weapon and was sentenced to seven and a half years in prison.
snippet: Maurice Clarett pleaded guilty Monday to aggravated robbery and carrying a concealed weapon and was sentenced to seven and a half years in prison.
